column3:
ホット！四人目の兄弟！兄貴のトレーニングをクリアするとは…
オマエ なかなかやるゴロ！
column4:
FEEL THE BURN, BLOOD BRO!If ya cleared my older bro's training...
you must be pretty impressive!

column3:
ホット！オレ達より ガマンできる オトコ！
腕力に自信はあるゴロ？！
ウデマエを見せる絶好のチャンスを
用意したゴロ！
兄貴の言う場所へ行けゴロ！
column4:
FEEL THE BURN, BROTHER!You're the main man who has more
endurance than us Gorons! But are
ya confident in your brute strength?!
I hope so, because we've prepared the
perfect chance to show off your skills!

Brother can fill ya in on where it is.
Once he does, head there pronto,
brother!

column3:
ホット！オマエがド根性ガケに登らず
ここに来る予感がしたから待ち構えてたゴロ！
さあ！今すぐド根性ガケに戻って
頂上を目指すゴロ！！
column4:
FEEL THE BURN, BROTHER!I knew you'd come here without beatin'
the Gut Check Challenge, so I've been
lyin' in wait for ya!
Now then! Stop bein' a tiny coward!
Hurry over to the Gut Check Challenge
and conquer that summit, brother!

column3: ホット！オレ達がここに どうやって来たか ゴロ？気合だゴロ！！
column4:
FEEL THE BURN, BROTHER!Wanna know how we got here?Pure. Fighting. Spirit.
That's how!

column3:
ホット！オレ達 ド根性四兄弟の末っ子！
オトコの中のオトコ！
オマエに負けないよう日々ここで暑さの
トレーニングを続けているゴロ！
column4:
FEEL THE BURN, BROTHER!You are a Goron among Hylians,
as recognized by the three
Goron Blood Brothers!
But I'm continuing my endurance training
every day to make sure I never lose to
you again!
